name: civil-services-us-attorneys-general
description: United States Attorneys General - View Contact Information for United States Attorneys General, including: Phone Number, Mailing Address, Official Website, Twitter & Facebook Accounts. ( JSON, XML, CSV, SQL, XLSX  & YML formats )

scripts.json-to-yml:
if ( test -e ./us-attorneys-general/data/us-attorneys-general.json ); then ./node_modules/.bin/json2yaml ./us-attorneys-general/data/us-attorneys-general.json > ./us-attorneys-general/data/us-attorneys-general.yml && echo '✓ Updated us-attorneys-general/data/us-attorneys-general.yml'; else echo '
× Missing ./us-attorneys-general/data/us-attorneys-general.json ( npm run -s convert-csv )
'; fi
scripts.json-to-xml:
if ( test -e ./us-attorneys-general/data/us-attorneys-general.json ); then node ./.scripts/json-to-xml.js && echo '✓ Updated us-attorneys-general/data/us-attorneys-general.xml'; else echo '
× Missing ./us-attorneys-general/data/us-attorneys-general.json ( npm run -s convert-csv )
'; fi
scripts.csv-to-sql:
if ( test -e ./us-attorneys-general/data/us-attorneys-general.json ); then node ./.scripts/csv-to-sql.js && echo '✓ Updated us-attorneys-general/data/us-attorneys-general.sql'; else echo '
× Missing ./us-attorneys-general/data/us-attorneys-general.json ( npm run -s convert-csv )
'; fi
scripts.csv-to-json:
if ( test -e ./us-attorneys-general/data/us-attorneys-general.csv ); then ./node_modules/.bin/csvtojson ./us-attorneys-general/data/us-attorneys-general.csv > ./us-attorneys-general/data/us-attorneys-general.json && json-pretty-print ./us-attorneys-general/data/us-attorneys-general.json ./us-attorneys-general/data/us-attorneys-general.json && sed -i '' 's/""/null/g'  ./us-attorneys-general/data/us-attorneys-general.json && sed -i '' 's/"true",/true,/g'  ./us-attorneys-general/data/us-attorneys-general.json && sed -i '' 's/"false",/false,/g'  ./us-attorneys-general/data/us-attorneys-general.json && sed -i '' 's/"district": 0/"district": null/g'  ./us-attorneys-general/data/us-attorneys-general.json && echo '✓ Updated us-attorneys-general/data/us-attorneys-general.json'; else echo '
× Missing ./us-attorneys-general/data/us-attorneys-general.csv ( npm run -s convert-csv )
'; fi
scripts.convert-csv:
if ( test -e ./source/us-attorneys-general.csv ); then node ./.scripts/convert-csv.js; else echo '
× Missing ./source/us-attorneys-general.csv ( see ./source/README.md )
'; fi
scripts.build-images:
npm run -s resize-headshots && npm run -s resize-backgrounds && echo '
☆ Image Conversion Complete
'
scripts.build-data:
if ( test -e ./us-attorneys-general/data/us-attorneys-general.csv ); then npm run -s csv-to-json && npm run -s json-to-yml && npm run -s json-to-xml && npm run -s csv-to-sql && echo '
☆ Data Conversion Complete
'; else echo '
× Missing ./us-attorneys-general/data/us-attorneys-general.csv
'; fi
scripts.build:
npm run -s convert-csv && npm run -s build && npm run -s build-images && echo '
☆ヽ(´▽｀)ノ All Done 
'
